channel.title: github 101 on Master Pi
channel.description: Recent content in github 101 on Master Pi

item.title: Getting Used To GitHub, Eps. 1
item.description: Hi, this is my first series about how to use git and github effectively. This would include some basic commands, tips and what to do in some specific situations. You also know how to deal with problems occur during the building setup, and a basic knowledge of GitHub Flow, what CI/CD is, … This is the first post in series “Github 101”, and you can find other posts at “See also” section.
